idea-plugin.name: Shopware Plugin
idea-plugin.description:
Shopware Plugin



Install Symfony2 Plugin and enable it per project (ignore messageboxes for now).

Dependencies

  • Symfony2 Plugin

Features

  • Event and method references for subscriber events
  • Smarty frontend references for files, controller, actions
  • Smarty block references on extends tag
  • Template controller references for php and smarty
  • Event name generator for common controller
  • Symfony2 container loader
  • Basic magic method resolving
  • Smarty namespace tags support
  • Smarty variables on controller actions
